text: What is the best way to apply a glossary link to words in my docs?

elements.text: What is the best way to apply a glossary link to words in my docs?

text:
I don’t know if this is good enough/if there are better, but you could set a heading like
```## [Glossary](@id gloss)```
for where your glossary is, then you can do refs like
```Here is some text with a [funky](@ref gloss) word.```

You could do a similar hack with each entry instead of the glossary header, too, but every single word will need its own id, I believe
